name: CPS Level Thumbnails
description: Adds thumbnails to levels in search.

thumbnailButton.name: Enable Thumbnail Button
thumbnailButton.description: Adds a <cj>button</c> in the <cy>Level Page</c> that lets you view the thumbnail of the level you are currently on.

cache-limit.name: Cache Limit
cache-limit.description: The amount of thumbnails that are cached in memory (Lower this if you have a low amount of available memory).

lists-limit-enabled.name: Enable Thumbnail Limit In Lists
lists-limit-enabled.description:
Allows you to <cy>limit</c> the amount of thumbnails shown in level lists.
<cy>Enable this setting if you experience lag when loading larger lists.</c>

level-lists-limit.name: Limit
level-lists-limit.description: Thumbnails won't be shown past the level with the limit as it's place in the list.

level-bg.name: Level BG
level-bg.description: Enable displaying thumbnails as the background in the online level screen.

blur-strength.name: Level BG Blur Strength
blur-strength.description: How blurred the background will be.
